2.3.1 Whitespace characters:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters'>
                        <property name='allowByTailComment' value='true'/>
                        <property name='allowEscapesForControlCharacters' value='true'/>
                        <property name='allowNonPrintableEscapes' value='true'/>
                    </module>"
}
2.3.2 Special escape sequences:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters'>
        <property name='allowByTailComment' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEscapesForControlCharacters' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowNonPrintableEscapes' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
2.3.3 Non-ASCII characters:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters'>
                        <property name='allowByTailComment' value='true'/>
                        <property name='allowEscapesForControlCharacters' value='true'/>
                        <property name='allowNonPrintableEscapes' value='true'/>
                    </module>"
}
3.3.3 Ordering and spacing:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='ImportOrder'>
        <property name='ordered' value='true'/>
        <property name='separated' value='true'/>
        <property name='sortStaticImports' value='true'/>
        <property name='sortImportsInGroup' value='true'/>
        <property name='caseSensitive' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
4 Formatting:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='RightCurly'>
        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
    </module>
    <module name='AvoidNestedBlocks'/>
    <module name='EmptyBlock'/>
    <module name='AvoidDoubleBraceInitialization'/>
    <module name='WhitespaceAround'>
        <property name='allowEmptyMethods' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyConstructors' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyTypes' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyLoops' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyLambdas' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyCatches' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MethodLength'>
        <property name='max' value='30'/>
    </module>
    <module name='FinalParameters'/>
    <module name='FinalClass'/>
    <module name='OneStatementPerLine'/>"
}
4.2 Block indentation: +2 spaces:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='2'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='0'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='0'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='0'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='2'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5.1 Where to break:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='OperatorWrap'>
        <property name='option' value='NL'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MethodParamPad'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5.2 Indent continuation lines at least:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='4'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='0'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='0'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='0'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='4'/>
    </module>"
}
4.6.2 Horizontal whitespace:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='SingleSpaceSeparator'>
        <property name='validateComments' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='GenericWhitespace'/>
    <module name='WhitespaceAround'/>
    <module name='NoWhitespaceBefore'/>
    <module name='TrailingComment'/>
    <module name='NoWhitespaceAfter'/>
    <module name='Indentation'/>
    <module name='MethodParamPad'/>
    <module name='EmptyLineSeparator'/>"
}
4.8.6 Comments:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='TrailingComment'>
        <property name='format' value='\\s*//.*'/>
    </module>
    <module name='JavadocMissingLeadingAsterisk'>
        <property name='allowAtLineStart' value='false'/>
    </module>"
}
4.8.7 Modifiers:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='ModifierOrder'>
        <property name='id' value='id_value_1'/>
        <property name='name_1' value='value_1'/>
        <property name='name_2' value='value_2'/>
        ...
        <property name='name_n' value='value_n'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.2 Class names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='DeclarationOrder'>
        <property name='ignoreOverloads' value='true'/>
        <property name='staticModifierPosition' value='before'/>
        <property name='instanceModifierPosition' value='before'/>
        <property name='constructorPosition' value='after'/>
        <property name='methodPosition' value='after'/>
    </module>"
}
7.1.2 Paragraphs:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='JavadocParagraph'>
        <property name='id' value='id_value_1'/>
        <property name='name_1' value='value_1'/>
        <property name='name_2' value='value_2'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RequireEmptyLineBeforeBlockTagGroup'>
        <property name='id' value='id_value_1'/>
        <property name='name_1' value='value_1'/>
        <property name='name_2' value='value_2'/>
    </module>"
}
7.3.1 Exception: self-explanatory member:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='InvalidJavadocPosition'>
        <property name='allowJavadocAfterAnnotations' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowJavadocBeforeAnnotations' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowJavadocBetweenAnnotations' value='false'/>
    </module>
    <module name='AvoidInlineConditionals'>
        <property name='allowInlineIf' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowInlineElseIf' value='false'/>
    </module>"
}

7.3.4 Non-required Javadoc:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='JavadocVariable'>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadoc' value='true'/>
        <property name='ignoreFinal' value='true'/>
        <property name='ignoreStatic' value='true'/>
        <property name='ignoreStaticFinal' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MissingJavadocType'>
        <property name='scope' value='PUBLIC'/>
    </module>
    <module name='InvalidJavadocPosition'/>
    <module name='SummaryJavadoc'/>
    <module name='MissingJavadocPackage'/>
    <module name='JavadocStyle'/>
    <module name='JavadocMissingWhitespaceAfterAsterisk'/>"
}

{

        <property name='allowAnnotationsOnSameLine' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMultipleAnnotationsOnSameLine' value='false'/>
    </module>"

{
    "Answer": "Yes",

        <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        <property name='ignoreFinal' value='false'/>
        <property name='ignoreStatic' value='false'/>
        <property name='ignoreStaticFinal' value='false'/>
    </module>"

{

        <property name='allowTrailingComma' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='NoArrayTrailingComma'>
        <property name='allowTrailingComma' value='false'/>
    </module>"
}

{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='2'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='true'/>
